caption:
The photograph depicts a man engaged in a scientific experiment in a laboratory setting. He is wearing a white lab coat and glasses, indicative of a professional or academic environment. The man has a prominent afro hairstyle and a beard, which adds a distinctive look typical of certain fashion eras such as the 1970s.

In the image, he is focusing intently on his work, holding a dropper in his right hand and using it to transfer liquid into a graduated cylinder that he is holding in his left hand. Behind him, there is a glass flask partially filled with another liquid, hinting at a complex experiment possibly involving chemical reactions or sample analysis.

The background is softly out of focus, emphasizing the man and his work while providing a nondescript backdrop that could be typical of any laboratory. This setting underscores the themes of research, science, and concentration. The overall composition of the photograph, with its focus on the subject and his task, highlights the importance of precision and expertise in scientific endeavors.
title: Epa gulf breeze laboratory: chemistry lab.  Dennis knight physical science technician, prepares pesticide sediment sample for injection into gas-liquid chromatograph
